group_1.textRight: Queen Himiko, my crops won't grow.@Please pray for me…

group_1.textLeft: I understand.@I'll do a ritual for you shortly.

group_1.textRight: ...Toyo, perhaps the cause is in the soil.

group_1.textLeft: Soil… I remember that there is life in the soil,@and it can live or die…

group_1.textRight: That's right… You've studied well.@Let's go investigate it next time.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, Toyo is like her research assistant.

group_1.textRight: I'm sure they'll do good work together.

group_1.textLeft: …That so?

group_1.textRight: Oh, Rena, what's got you so down@in the dumps?
Lately, Toyo is so busy that Rena doesn't@get to play with her.

group_1.textLeft: Th-that's…!
[chara:100901:effect_shake]...Tch…I can endure it, because it's something@I can handle…

group_1.textRight: You're trying so hard to hold back…
Sorry, Rena…

group_1.textLeft: It's okay…@Besides, look at that.

group_1.textCenter: Eh? We took our eyes off them for a second@and things suddenly got all awkward…

group_1.textRight: Who was next...?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, yeah. They're gonna be here in just a bit.

group_1.textRight: Is that so.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
Aaah… It's too hot here.

group_1.textRight: …Is that so.

group_1.textCenter: N-now that they're finished, all they have@to talk about is the weather?!
They don't seem to talk much outside of work.

group_1.textLeft: Hm… Now that we know they're mother@and daughter...
It should be more like...you know?

group_1.textRight: You're right, it's more like...that.

group_1.textLeft: More like…what exactly?

group_1.textRight: SO, I was thinking that they ought to be@more affectionate with each other.
Then let's do a mission like we did before.
We'll help bring Lady Himiko and Toyo@closer together.

group_1.textLeft: Great, let's do it!@We've had great success then.
I wouldn't say getting them a dog was very@successful.

group_1.textRight: It's fine, Slurpy is cute.
Walking Slurpy around was lots of fun!

group_1.textLeft: You're missing the point...

group_1.textRight: It'll be fine this time!@I've got a great idea!

group_1.textLeft: The…oh-shun…?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Let's go to the beach and stay overnight.
We'll invite Lady Himiko to come with us@and have a great time.

group_1.textLeft: But..something's going on with the crops@right now.
And there's still the trouble with Kuna…@I can't just go off to play…

group_1.textRight: Kuna is after you, right?
Then we'll be there to protect you…@The safest place is by our side, don'tcha think?
Besides, you've only studied the local crops@around here, right?
It would be good to check if the issues@vary regionally…
I'm sure that would also help in determining@the cause of the problem.

group_1.textLeft: You sure know your stuff, Kaede.

group_1.textRight: Ehehe…

group_1.textLeft: W-well… I suppose if you're gonna do something,@you gotta do it right…
I want to go to the oh-shun, too!

group_1.textRight: Then it's settled!@Let's go talk to Lady Himiko about it!

group_1.textLeft: But I wonder…@What if she says no?

group_1.textRight: It's going to be just fine.

group_1.textLeft: …Nahaha, the oh-shun…@I've never seen it before.
This'll be fun!

group_1.textRight: …Hey, Toyo, are you not feeling well?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:105201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Wh-why do you ask?

group_1.textRight: It's just, I feel like you aren't as talkative@as usual…

group_1.textLeft: That's not true.@I'm the same as always.

group_1.textRight: Ugh… When you say that, everything feels@like it's normal…
But still, I'm a little worried about you@getting possessed…

group_1.textLeft: I-I am okay with it!@It's all right!

group_1.textRight: Okay…
…Well, let's just wait and see,@and if everything's fine, we'll go.
Yeah, let's do that.

group_1.textLeft: I'm so excited!
